definitions.definition: A group or association of cooperating members.
( sports ) An organization of sports teams which play against one another for a championship .
examples: My favorite sports organizations are the National Football League and the American League in baseball.

definitions.definition: ( informal , rugby , uncountable ) Ellipsis of rugby league .
examples: Are you going to watch the league tonight?

definitions.definition: ( chiefly in the negative ) A class or type of people or things that are evenly matched or on the same level.
examples: Forget about dating him; he's out of your league .
We're not even in the same league .

definitions.definition: A prefecture -level administrative unit in Inner Mongolia (Chinese: 盟 ).

main_definition: A group or association of cooperating members.
secondary_definitions: ( sports ) An organization of sports teams which play against one another for a championship .
( informal , rugby , uncountable ) Ellipsis of rugby league .
( chiefly in the negative ) A class or type of people or things that are evenly matched or on the same level.
A prefecture -level administrative unit in Inner Mongolia (Chinese: 盟 ).

definitions.definition: The distance that a person can walk in one hour , commonly taken to be approximately three English miles (about five kilometers ).
A stone erected near a public road to mark the distance of a league.

main_definition: ( measurement ) The distance that a person can walk in one hour , commonly taken to be approximately three English miles (about five kilometers ).
secondary_definitions: A stone erected near a public road to mark the distance of a league.
